summary: The document outlines the operational procedures and policies of the Americas Region Reputational Risk Committee at Deutsche Bank. It details the responsibilities of the Secretary, the process for agenda setting, minute recording, and the escalation of unresolved issues within the committee structure.
keyFacts: The document is marked as confidential and is intended for internal use only.
It describes the roles and responsibilities of the Secretary in maintaining meeting agendas and minutes.
The committee has a structured process for escalating unresolved issues to higher authorities within the organization.
